Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.22 Hetuduka, Sanidassanasappaṭighattika » 1.22.1 Anidassanasappaṭighapada » 1.22.1.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Suddha
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Sanidassanasappaṭighattika
Anidassanasappaṭighapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Suddha
542.
1217Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, kamme ekaṃ, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, magge ekaṃ, vippayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
543.
1218Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā ekaṃ (sabbe paccayā kātabbā)…pe…  novigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Hetvādiup1.22.1.7 Pañhāvāra >>
